details:
adjective
- violently agitated and turbulent
= example: violently agitated and turbulent
= synonyms: rough
- noisy and lacking in restraint or discipline
= example: noisy and lacking in restraint or discipline
= synonyms: unruly, rambunctious, robustious, rumbustious
- full of rough and exuberant animal spirits
= example: full of rough and exuberant animal spirits
= synonyms: knockabout
